title: I got an outstanding MS Thesis in School of Computing, KAIST for Year 2025!
body: I got a certificate of achievement for an outstanding MS Thesis! It is related to the paper that was accepted to the CHI'26! You can see the device named ConCon and its open-hardware with demo Unity scene in upcomming April!

title: ConCon accepted to CHI 2026
body: Our paper, \"ConCon: A Wrist-Worn Clutch-Coupled Force-Feedback Device for VR Controller\", was accepted to CHI 2026! Looking forward to presenting our work in Barcelona!

title: I presented my paper StringTouch at Busan
body: I presented the paper "StringTouch: A Non-occlusive 3DoF Haptic Interface Using String Structures for Modulating Finger Sensations" in UIST 2025, Busan. You can find the paper in ACM DL or this hompage!

title: Our Team (Geppetto) won the Minister's Award for ICT Challenge 2025
body: Our Team (Me, Kyunghwan, Taejun from KAIST HCI Lab) presented ConCon, which is a wrist-grounded 3DoF force feedback device compatible with existing VR controllers, enabling realistic haptic interactions without extra tracking, and won the Minister's Award for ICT Challenge 2025 in Republic of Korea!

title: StringTouch accepted to UIST 2025
body: Our paper, "StringTouch: A Non-occlusive 3DoF Haptic Interface Using String Structures for Modulating Finger Sensations", was accepted to UIST 2025. Looking forward to presenting our work in Busan!

title: Serving as a reviewer for ISMAR 2025
body: I will be serving as a reviewer for the ISMAR 2025 conference. Honored to contribute to the HCI community.
